message: Dude, that jade had some fucking curse on it. Also, just be honest bro. Say baby girl your brother tried to kill me along with your daddy. I can’t take that but hey, I still respect the hell out of you. Why not just be honest? Why hurt her and be a dick? Also if that was her moms real pendant you broke it, also yeah don’t take shit from another woman with your woman there 🤣😂 she was about to foam at the mouth lol 😂
I am watching, this donghua good.
